column1: * 1947 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a Letter to Rosemary (30 September 1947).
* 1963 - Music producer Carvin Knowles is born.
* 1997 - The album An Evening in Rivendell is released.
* 2000 - J.R.R. Tolkien and His Literary Resonances is published.

column3: the Gothenburg Tolkien Society of Sweden.

column1: * 2014 - Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor is released.
** Crickhollow is raided by three Nazgûl in the early hours and Fredegar Bolger alerts the village. The Black Riders run away.
** The Prancing Pony at Bree is simultaneously raided but the Black Riders find only pillows in the Hobbits beds. The ponies are lost.
** Frodo Baggins and his companions buy Bill the Pony from Bill Ferny and leave Bree together with Aragorn.
** Gandalf comes to Crickhollow and sees Frodos cloak outside. Losing hope
column2: he reaches Bree at night. He meets Barliman Butterbur who apologises and tells him the Hobbits left with Strider.
